Task:
- Based on the described feature or selected code, decide where each part belongs: Workflow / Activity / Worker / Client.
- Provide a 4-row table (Yes/No + why) and a minimal compile-ready skeleton.
- Call out determinism implications explicitly.

Output format:
1) Placement table
2) Recommended boundaries
3) Minimal skeleton
